mapper.select: SELECT faq_no faqNo, account_id AccountId, faq_writer faqWriter, faq_title faqTitle, faq_content faqContent, faq_createdate faqCreatedate, faq_updatedate faqUpdatedate, faq_count faqCount, faq_category faqCategory FROM faq ORDER BY faq_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO faq ( account_id, faq_writer, faq_title, faq_content, faq_createdate, faq_updatedate, faq_count, faq_category ) VALUES ( #{accountId}, #{faqWriter}, #{faqTitle}, #{faqContent}, now(), now(), 0, #{faqCategory} )
mapper.update: UPDATE faq SET faq_title = #{faqTitle}, faq_content = #{faqContent}, faq_updatedate = now(), faq_category = #{faqCategory} WHERE faq_no = #{faqNo}
